title: Malfunction Screen Pixel 3a - Burn Defect After Charge
content:
Hello, i hope somebody here can help me.

I've been using Pixel 3a for 2 weeks. Yesterday i charge my phone as usual (with the original charger)
After full, i notice there was small black dot on the bottom right, looking like a burn trace. 

Then soon after, the dot becomes larger. Today it gets worse. I dont know what to do.. what should i do?
i purchased this is US but i live in Indonesia.. how can i contact google to claim this?
